Rulings.Edison: ●When Gyaku-Gire Panda is equipped with Rod of the Mind's Eye and attacks, the Battle Damage is 1000 points.
Rulings.Tengu: ●When Gyaku-Gire Panda is equipped with Rod of the Mind's Eye and attacks, the Battle Damage is 1000 points.
Rulings.Goat:
●When Gyaku-Gire Panda is equipped with Rod of the Mind's Eye and attacks, the Battle Damage is 1000 points.
●Q: Is the increase of “Gyaku-Gire Panda” permanent or is it like “United We Stand?” 
A: The ATK increase is a continuous effect and will adjust as the number of monsters on your opponent's side of the field change.   
●Q: If Gyaku-Gire Panda is Normal Summoned or Special Summoned and your opponent has 2 or more monsters on the field, can the opponent use “Trap Hole” or “Bottomless Trap Hole”? 
A: Yes, they can, because the ATK of Gyaku-Gire Panda is increased the moment it is successfully Summoned. Steve Okegawa, 02/03/04

PSCT.Base: Increase the ATK of this card by 500 points for each monster on your opponent's side of the field. When this card attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of your opponent's Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points.
